alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:36AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Defiance, Putnam, Paulding, Henry, southeastern Williams and southwestern Fulton Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 235 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Continental, or 10 miles south of Defiance, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holgate and Napoleon. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 27 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall may also occur with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Williams
